note.p: Death Place: 23 Savile Row, London (06 October 1873)
Career: Independent researcher, with no paid employment; became a British subject (28 November 1845) and Resident in England
Memberships: Corresponding member of the Tasmanian Society (later the Royal Society of Tasmania) (1841); FRGS; Athanaeum Club
References: Article from Australia's Heritage, part 33 (May 1971)
